verses.verse: And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5357>bowls<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2980>spoke<s%> with me, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1204>"Come<s%> <S%G1204>here,<s%> I shall <S%G1166>show<s%> you the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4204>harlot<s%> who <S%G2521>sits<s%> on <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters,<s%>

with <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G4203>committed<s%> [acts of] <S%G4203>immorality,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> were <S%G3184>made<s%> <S%G3184>drunk<s%> with the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of her <S%G4202>immorality.<s%> "

And he <S%G667>carried<s%> me <S%G667>away<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> into a <S%G2048>wilderness;<s%> and I <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> on a <S%G2847>scarlet<s%> <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G988>blasphemous<s%> <S%G3686>names,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> and <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns.<s%>

And the <S%G1135>woman<s%> was <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G4210>purple<s%> and <S%G2847>scarlet,<s%> and <S%G5558>adorned<s%> with <S%G5553>gold<s%> and <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> and <S%G3135>pearls,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> in her <S%G5495>hand<s%> a <S%G5552>gold<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G946>abominations<s%> and of the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G169>things<s%> of her <S%G4202>immorality,<s%>

and upon her <S%G3359>forehead<s%> a <S%G3686>name<s%> [was] <S%G1125>written,<s%> a <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> <S%G897>"BABYLON<s%> THE <S%G3173>GREAT,<s%> THE <S%G3384>MOTHER<s%> OF <S%G4204>HARLOTS<s%> AND OF THE <S%G946>ABOMINATIONS<s%> OF THE <S%G1093>EARTH.<s%>"

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3184>drunk<s%> with the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> and with the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> And when I <S%G3708>saw<s%> her, I <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G2295>greatly.<s%> <S%G3173><s%>

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G2296>wonder<s%>? I shall <S%G3004>tell<s%> you the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G1135>woman<s%> and of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> that <S%G941>carries<s%> her, which <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> and the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns.<s%>

"The <S%G2342>beast<s%> that you <S%G3708>saw<s%> was and is not, and is <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G305>come<s%> up out of the <S%G12>abyss<s%> and to <S%G5217>go<s%> to <S%G684>destruction.<s%> And <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> will <S%G2296>wonder,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> has not been <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G975>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> from the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> when they <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> that he was and is not and will <S%G3918>come.<s%>

<S%G5602>"Here<s%> is the <S%G3563>mind<s%> which <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom.<s%> The <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> are <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G3735>mountains<s%> on <S%G3699>which<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2521>sits,<s%>

and they are <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G935>kings;<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> have <S%G4098>fallen,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> is, the <S%G243>other<s%> has not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come;<s%> and <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G2064>comes,<s%> he <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3306>remain<s%> a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G3641>while.<s%>

"And the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was and is not, is <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> an <S%G3590>eighth,<s%> and is [one] of the <S%G2033>seven,<s%> and he <S%G5217>goes<s%> to <S%G684>destruction.<s%>

"And the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G3708>saw<s%> are <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G935>kings,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> have not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> but they <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> as <S%G935>kings<s%> with the <S%G2342>beast<s%> for <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>
<S%G3778>"These<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1106>purpose<s%> and they <S%G1325>give<s%> their <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G1849>authority<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast.<s%>

<S%G3778>"These<s%> will <S%G4170>wage<s%> <S%G4170>war<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> and the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> will <S%G3528>overcome<s%> them, <S%G3754>because<s%> He is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G2962>lords<s%> and <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G935>kings,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are with Him [are the] <S%G2822>called<s%> and <S%G1588>chosen<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful.<s%>"

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, "The <S%G5204>waters<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> the <S%G4204>harlot<s%> <S%G2521>sits,<s%> are <S%G2992>peoples<s%> and <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> and <S%G1484>nations<s%> and <S%G1100>tongues.<s%>

"And the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G3708>saw,<s%> and the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> will <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G4204>harlot<s%> and will <S%G4160>make<s%> her <S%G2049>desolate<s%> and <S%G1131>naked,<s%> and will <S%G2068>eat<s%> her <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and will <S%G2618>burn<s%> her up with <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

"For <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1325>put<s%> it in their <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to <S%G4160>execute<s%> His <S%G1106>purpose<s%> by <S%G4160>having<s%> a <S%G1520>common<s%> <S%G1106>purpose,<s%> and by <S%G1325>giving<s%> their <S%G932>kingdom<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should be <S%G5055>fulfilled.<s%>

"And the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G3708>saw<s%> is the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> which <S%G2192>reigns<s%> <S%G932><s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>"
